description: "Plan of the city of Batavia (Jakarta), its suburbs and surrounding areas, focussing on the river and canal system. This is a copy of an original c.1790 map. The pier has been pencilled in, as it was not built when the original map was produced."
title: "Situatieplan van Batavia desselfs stranden en ommelanden, tot omtrent eene duytsche myl, beoosten, bewesten en bezuyden de stad, gereekend vertoonen de, voornaamlyk, den tezaamenhang en verdeeling van de wateren, zowel der rivieren als gragten, enz"
